Hope next material will as good as it is now.

results.content: Alex is excellent at presenting the information very clearly and keeping it interesting.  He also doesn't leave anything to question for what you need to do.  You can follow along and do the same thing he is doing to develop the website.  Highly recommend!

results.content: The course was beyond what I expected. I feel like all my questions were answered on a way or another during the course and I feel prepared for developing websites utilizing HTML and CSS. Thank you Alexander!

results.content:
It's a good course. It helped me understand better some CSS and i think it's a very good course for someone who just want to make his own site.
The only bad part is in some lessons the code is too small to see when using text editor and video on the same screen. 
So thank you and good luck!

results.content: Fantastic content and presentation!  Everything is explained clearly and thoroughly, and the instructor's enthusiasm is infectious.  I learned a LOT and had fun doing it.  I look forward to taking more of his courses.

results.content: Alex is a great instructor he really knows his stuff. This is a great course for anyone who wants to learn how a website is built and the design looks great too. I highly recommend this course and his WordPress courses as well.

results.content: Alex has an unique style of guiding his students as he makes complicated things simple. The way he arranges the materials little step by little step, it's saved me from getting boring with those hard stuff, on the contrary, it's fun to learn as things progress bit by bit. Also, I like the way he explains the techniques of applying those elements, he makes things easy to understand. Besides that, I've also learnt from him on YouTube channel, overall, I think Alex makes an excellent online instructor and I would give him a thumbs up and big thank you! Way to go !
